    • continuedFraction

      public static int[] continuedFraction(double value, int iterations)
      Calculates the Rational form of a double, using the continued fraction method
      Parameters:
      value - the double value to convert to a Rational
      iterations - the number of iterations of the continued fractions formula to run
      Returns:
      the numerator and denominator of the double in Rational form

    • contFractIteration

      public static double[] contFractIteration(double value, double prevN1, double prevD1, double prevN2, double prevD2)
      Runs a single iteration of the continued fraction formula
      Parameters:
      value - the double value to convert to a Rational
      prevN1 - the numerator of the previous iteration of the formula
      prevD1 - the denominator of the previous iteration of the formula
      prevN2 - the numerator of the second-to-last iteration of the formula
      prevD2 - the denominator of the second-to-last iteration of the formula
      Returns:
      the numerator and denominator of the Rational form of value, along with the remainder
